Index >  FTPUserName

FTPUserName

Description

Returns or sets the user name used to log into a FTP server.

Data type

<string>

Syntax

.FTPUserName = 'admin';

Remarks

If you want to use "anonymous" user to log into a FTP server, then you don't need to set FTPUserName or FTPUserPassword.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

FTPPassword
FTPPort
FTPDownload
FTPUpload()
HTTPPort
HTTPDownload()
HTTPUploadThroughPost()
